title: Direct cause of first World War

content.prompt: Which of the following most directly led to the start of the First World War?

choices.label: European powers meeting in Berlin in 1884 and 1885 to divide Africa into colonies
Nationalist competition among industrialized powers for resources
Japanese imperialist expansion into Korea and China
Political tensions between communist and capitalist states

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
